#######################################################################################################
# Format: Whatever follows a '#' is a comment.
#         Uncommented lines must start w/ 32 characters of 0's and 1's (i.e., an instruction or data word)
#######################################################################################################
# instructions start here (first line is address 0)
00010000001000100000000000000100
10001100100000110000000000000000
10101100100000110000000000000000
00100000001000010000000000000001
00001000000000000000000000000000 # EOP
11111100000000000000000000000000
# Data goes below
00000000000000000000000000000001 #
00000000000000000000000000000010 #
00000000000000000000000000000011
00000000000000000000000000000100
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
